/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, and people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue sky and the various hues of the buildings. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the blend of nature and urban development.
